module.name: Name Phonetics
module.author: PIH
module.description: Provides a simple data model and API for doing algorithmic-based name searching

globalProperty.description: The name of a soundex type algorithm to use for patient searches. Default values built into this module are: Soundex, Refined Soundex, Metaphone, Double Metaphone, Caverphone. You can also add your own algorithms programatically. If left blank, no alorithmic transformation will be stored in the db for searching of this name field.

The name of a soundex type algorithm to use for patient searches. Default values built into this module are: Soundex, Refined Soundex, Metaphone, Double Metaphone, Caverphone. You can also add your own algorithms programatically. If left blank, no alorithmic transformation will be stored in the db for searching of this name field.

The name of a soundex type algorithm to use for patient searches. Default values built into this module are: Soundex, Refined Soundex, Metaphone, Double Metaphone, Caverphone. You can also add your own algorithms programatically. If left blank, no alorithmic transformation will be stored in the db for searching of this name field.

The name of a soundex type algorithm to use for patient searches. Default values built into this module are: Soundex, Refined Soundex, Metaphone, Double Metaphone, Caverphone. You can also add your own algorithms programatically. If left blank, no algorithmic transformation will be stored in the db for searching of this name field.
